pesticide.PPE: A long-sleeved shirt and long pants; chemical-resistant gloves made of any waterproof material; shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 16 fl oz per acre per cropping system
